description:
A lightweight lid to add safety to your daily commutes and your weekend adventures. From gravel roads to smooth bike lanes, the Allroad has a low profile that makes time in the saddle more comfortable. Safe-T occipital retention systems encircles your whole head, letting you dial-in a perfect fit. With a MIPS liner you get an extra layer of protection, and the integrated LED helps keep you seen on low-light rides.

  • MIPS® C-2 technology (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) reduces rotational forces in an oblique impact. An inner shell sandwiched between the foam and the padding reduces the rotational torque on the skull
  • Made of polystyrene foam fused to a polycarbonate shell
  • In-mould construction improves shock absorption and durability
  • Adjustable straps are ultra-light
  • Retention system dial offers horizontal and vertical adjustments to tune the fit to your head
  • Pads quickly absorb and disperse perspiration and are removable for washing
  • Integrated rear LED light and reflective rear stickers
name: MET Allroad MIPS Helmet - Unisex
